story

" GROOMING IS THE SECRET OF REAL ELEGANCE. THE BEST CLOTHES, THE MOST WONDERFUL JEWELS, THE MOST GLAMOROUS BEAUTY DON'T COUNT WITHOUT GOOD GROOMING "

- CHRISTIAN DIOR

ABOUT D-SHAVE

D Shave is an attempt to revive the old school Indian Barbering. The shop where the age-old art of barbering meets the new age techniques and technology.

ABOUT D-MAN

Darshan started his carrier at the age of 16 working in Mumbai as an intern, sweeper/cleaner to becoming a Salon director to creating iconic styles for celebrities like Ranveer Singh, Salman Khan, Ranbeer Kapoor and many more. Darshans passion, perseverance & dedication are directed towards adding value to Indian Barbering Industry.
